page.title: 04Transport.
page.content: The Metro has got automatic doors and they are sometimes dangerous. You could get stuck in them. Thers is a warning tone to warn you when the door will close.There is a green light to tell you when you can press the button to open the doors.Inside there are rows of seats to sit down if you are going a long way. When i get to the Metro station i press B4 and it tells you what to pay. If it says 30p and you put 50p in, it gives you your 20p change and if you put 20p in, it tells you,you need to pay 10p more.Then you go to a machine into which you put your ticket and it cancels your ticket so that you can't use it again with out paying again. If an inspector checks your ticket it shows that it is valid. By Marilyn Manning
